description:
Sakuya teases Nagi explaining that she is so bratty that she can`t take care of young children. Furious, she asks Hayate to go out and find her kids to take care of.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Do You Like Rich, Pretty Ladies?
Okanemochi de Kirei na Onee-san wa Suki Desuka?
お金持ちでキレイなお姉さんは好きですか?
